name: Poor Kid
description:
Poor Kid is about you and lil bro who are very poor without parents and you have to survive out in the open. You have to buy 20 gifts for your lil bro to win the game.

Builds for all platforms will come once i have them prepared.

Made for Secret Santa Game Jam 2022, this was a late submission because i was lazy to upload it and kinda forgot to 💀

This was their letter: 

i couldn't implement everything they asked for :'(
